Title: lead
Feature: lead ( value anycompatible [, offset integer [, default anycompatible ]] ) â†’ anycompatible
Description: Returns value evaluated at the row that is offset rows after the current row within the partition; if there is no such row, instead returns default (which must be of a type compatible with value). Both offset and default are evaluated with respect to the current row. If omitted, offset defaults to 1 and default to NULL.
